title: Dead Soul
description: With the Confederation barely holding together, Roland Mills, Valentina Sikorsky, and other characters from IN HER FIRST CONTACT and LEGEND OF THE SWORD lead an attack to free a human colony invaded by the alien Kreelan Empire.Standing against them are legions of Kreelan warriors and a deadly warrior priestess feared by her own people, who call her the Dead Soul...
author: Michael R. Hicks
